name: kibana-proxy
description: Server tier for (kibana)[http://kibana.org/kibana3]; Proxies the calls to Elasticsearch and insert authentication.

scripts.install: [ -f kibana/index.html ] && exit 0; mkdir -p kibana; curl https://download.elasticsearch.org/kibana/kibana/kibana-3.1.2.tar.gz | tar xvzf - -C kibana --strip-components=1

author: Hugues Malphettes
